title: Liz Cheney 'Nine Barrels Shooting' Threat
summary: Trump suggested Liz Cheney should face 'nine barrels shooting at her' during Arizona campaign rally. Part of pattern of violent rhetoric against political opponents.
keyFacts: Suggested Liz Cheney should face 'nine barrels shooting at her'
Made during Arizona campaign rally in November 2024
Part of broader pattern of violent rhetoric against opponents
Cheney had been vice chair of January 6 Committee investigating Trump
Widely condemned as incitement to violence against political opponent

sources.text: CNN: Trump says 'war hawk' Liz Cheney should be fired upon in escalation of violent rhetoric
NBC News: Trump attacks Liz Cheney, says she wouldn't be a 'war hawk' if 'guns are trained on her face'
Axios: Arizona AG to investigate Trump's Liz Cheney comment as potential death threat
Al Jazeera: In Context - What Trump said about Cheney facing a firing squad
